segments.text: They got a divorce at last .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's inevitable . Their love wasbuilt on the sand , and this is why their marriage has landed on the rocks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said it . Love but on the sand will soon be on the rocks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That give us a good lesson .
segments.speaker: S2
